# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="76669-102">Outlook on the web で言語、日付と時刻の形式、またはタイム ゾーンを変更する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76669-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="76669-103">ページの上部で、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76669-103">At the top of the page, select Print.</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="76669-104">**[設定]** > **[Outlook のすべての設定を表示]** の順に選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76669-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="76669-105">**[全般]** > **[言語と時刻]** の順に選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76669-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="76669-106">使用する言語を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76669-106">Select the language that you want to use for speech recognition and text-to-speech.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="76669-107">**[保存]** を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76669-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="76669-108">詳細については、「[Outlook on the web でタイム ゾーンと言語を変更する](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="76669-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
